EmailTemplate.subject: Stop by the TriTech Booth at the Western Massachusetts Police Chief’s Association Annual Tradeshow, November 8
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Western Massachusetts Police Chief’s Association Annual Tradeshow November 8, 2011 | Holyoke, MA
Stop by and see us next week at the Western Massachusetts Police Chief’s Association Annual Tradeshow and visit with TriTech-Imc Solutions Client Account Manager, David Bell.
David Bell David.Bell@TriTech.com 774-239-3722
If you would like to pre-schedule a demonstration of our CAD, Mobile Data, Civil Process, Corrections or Records Management solutions, please call or email David Bell at 774.239.3722 or david.bell@tritech.com.
Enter to Win a Law Monopoly Game at the TriTech Booth
Stop by and visit with us to see why TriTech is the fastest growing company in Public Safety and Medical Transport.
Can't make the conference in East Holyoke next week? Please contact David Bell at 774.239.3722 or david.bell@tritech.com
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121
